snippet: The New York Festival of Song’s series, NYFOS Next, will include excerpts from Paul Moravec’s adaptation of “The Shining” along with other works in progress.
abstract: The New York Festival of Song’s series, NYFOS Next, will include excerpts from Paul Moravec’s adaptation of “The Shining” along with other works in progress.

headline.main: Excerpts From 'The Shining' Opera Among Offerings at Vocal Music Festival
